staxel.village.dialogue.TomboyPrimary.li: Hey there, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I've been doing a bit of thinking recently...
Sure it's fun to just skate around and catch bugs, but I think I can do something more...
Once upon a time, things were quite different for me, you know?
I didn't always have quite this much freedom of expression!
So I'd like to pass that opportunity on to others too!
But to do that I'm going to need a little help from you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
What I'd like you to do is actually pretty easy!
I want you to make me a ^c:d03e37;small wagon^c:pop;...
You know, a bit like the ones the Murmurs come by in to trade!
Trouble is... I'm not even sure where to begin with that...
Perhaps you could go talk to a few of them and see if they're willing to give you some advice?
Oh, you managed to convince them to give up a ^c:d03e37;wagon blueprint^c:pop;?
That's great! Thanks ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I'll be waiting right here to see it finished!
Yes! This is exactly what I was talking about, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Great job! Soon I'll be able to show people the meaning of individual freedom!
For now, let's just see how this goes before we think about expanding any further!
Thanks lots for all your help, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Feel free to take a look around when I have my wares out!
Did you manage to find anything out from the Murmurs?
I really think it would help to get some idea how their ^c:d03e37;wagons^c:pop; are built!
Ohh! It's so much nicer than I imagined!
You've done a great job, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Now I just need you to set it up somewhere for me!
Just place my ^c:d03e37;store sign^c:pop; down somewhere with the ^c:d03e37;wagon^c:pop;!
I'll be waiting right here to see it finished!
How about it, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
Just place my ^c:d03e37;store sign^c:pop; down somewhere with the ^c:d03e37;wagon^c:pop;!
That's all we have left to do!
Oh... You mean start selling different types of clothing?
I... Hmm... Maybe...
Okay! I can't imagine why anyone would want anything else, but it's worth a shot!
I guess we need to start prototyping some new outfits then...
Could you come back tomorrow so I can have some time to think?
Right! ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I've figured it out!
All I need is for you to make me these ^c:d03e37;prototypes^c:pop; I came up with!
I think some of the materials might be a little hard to come by...
But if you scour all the ^c:1486b0;portal islands^c:pop;, you just might find them!
I still need some time to think...
Could you come back tomorrow?
Ohhh... I didn't know this style of clothing could look so good...!
Maybe this really will do the trick!
Now if only we had a bit more space to lay them out for sale... Hehe!
Please! That'll be all, honest!
...probably...
Just make one of those and place it with the ^c:d03e37;wagon^c:pop; so we have space!
How's it going with those ^c:d03e37;prototypes^c:pop;?
I think a couple of new ^c:1486b0;portal islands^c:pop; might have opened!
Might be worth looking there if you can't find what you need!
I'm counting on you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
That's perfect, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I really hope this helps to sell a few more things!
I need to expand more so I can start showing people what freedom of expression is on other islands too!
You were a big help, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I hope you'll come by and buy something sometime!
Hey! ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
So maybe things aren't going as well as I'd hoped...
Sure, people come and take a look every now and then, but I haven't really sold anything much...
What do you think it could be?
Are my styles just not trendy enough?
I think you need to diversify...
...Diversify? You think I need to sell more styles?
Hey! That's not a bad idea!
We could start selling more tees with bug prints and-
No! Not like that...
Hey, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
You know... I've been avoiding this for some time, but ^c:1486b0;Emilia^c:pop; being around made me think about it...
There's...a real market for that kind of style, isn't there?
You know, with all the frills and poofy dresses, and all that?
It's...not really my thing, but it'd be nice to have a friend wearing clothing you designed, right?
And I'm sure it'd sell well overseas!
There's only one real problem, and that's what I need you for, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
With these kind of clothes some of the materials are pretty rare.
Like...extremely rare! I doubt you'd find them if you searched your whole life normally...
But I do know one place that might have them...
This should get you there. If you look around a bit, I think you'll find what we need!
You really should head over to ^c:1486b0;that island^c:pop;...
I'd go myself, but... Well there are reasons why I can't.
Besides, you're really good at this kind of thing, aren't you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, you're back!
How did it go?
About the castle...
Hm?
Oh, you probably shouldn't think too hard about things you saw there!
^c:1486b0;Emilia^c:pop; and I used to be pretty close, but there isn't much more to say on the matter...
Freedom of expression really is important, huh?
Thanks for the materials! They'll be perfect for what I had in mind!
If you come back tomorrow, you can probably see them first-hand!
Your help really was invaluable, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
I hope this is enough to show at least some of my appreciation!
Oh, and feel free to give me a yell if you decide you want a roomie!
